website_summaries.verdict: A one-of-a-kind roof hook that delivers great combination of affordability and quality.
pros: Designed for use with 99% of ladders
Plastic construction  won't scratch roof or gutters
Equipped with anti-slip technology to reduce risk of sliding when in use
cons: Less durable compared to other options

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: This worked awesome on a 2 story apartment building. When you start climbing and the ladder is flexing, you dont need it to be shifting sideways on you, and this solves that problem perfectly. The rubber grip on both sides works great and it fit inside a shallow gutter and still performed great even though it was tilting outward a little. The only thing i wish was different is that it had some sort of internal bracing so that when i put the weight of the ladder against the gutter there is less of a chance of it bending the gutter. Maybe something that braces against the back of the gutter slightly. Overall: super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SeriousTree

customer_reviews.title: Allows me to work cleaning my gutters independently!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for when I don't have help holding my extension ladder on the taller side of my house. Did a test run with it and worked very well. You'll need a long pole to lift this up and onto your gutter. Once up there, level and rest your ladder on this and you're good to go. I climbed up to the top on a lower spot and tried to wiggle the ladder side to side. This held it in place perfectly with it's non slip rubber. Definitely allows me to work cleaning my gutters more independently. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Renesis79

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought this for his job as a roofing inspector to prevent damage to the gutters. He says it works like a charm and will not get on a roof without one. I know this is not much of a review, but this is all I could get out of him. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: FlaDiver

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for not damaging a homeowners gutters. I'm in roofing and use this quite often for my inspections. I carry a telescoping pole to place it on the gutter and I'm all set.
customer_reviews.author: JC44

customer_reviews.title: This Ladder's Little Helper does a good job of spreading the pressure points over a wider ...
customer_reviews.text: Whenever I placed the ladder on the gutter, I've had trouble bending the gutter and the ladder sliding. This Ladder's Little Helper does a good job of spreading the pressure points over a wider span of the gutter which makes it stronger and keeps it from bending. It's more stable too with the rubber layer that prevents it from sliding. Neglected for years and finally got all the gutter debris cleaned out.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Hoo

customer_reviews.title: Great safely product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this months ago and finally got to try it it recently. I do a lot of work on commercial buildings and my extension ladder would always slide when leaning it up on gutters. Once it makes contact, it doesn't go anywhere. I do recommend getting a broom handle or finding some type of telescopic handle to get it on the gutter if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works well for stabilizing your ladder.
customer_reviews.text: Good little gizmo - really does keep your ladder from sliding around. Makes it safer to climb up to and down from your roof especially. Also helps protect your gutters from ladder damage.
customer_reviews.author: The Knife Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder Tool
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of best tools I've used with a ladder. Doesn't bend or scratch the rain gutter. Its great and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: robert c

customer_reviews.title: stabilize
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help protect my gutters and to help stabilize the ladder. This did keep the ladder from shifting however I was expecting the gadget to be deeper and put more weight against the house and ease weight off the gutter. This is not the case. It is not deep enough to reach the actual roof. It just distributes weight along the gutter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smart design
customer_reviews.text: Very happy works just exactly as it's supposed to no complaints. Shouldn't need another one unless I lose this one if I do I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product to protect gutters and help stabilize your ladder
customer_reviews.text: A great product for those folks who need to get on their roofs often. It protects the gutters from scratches and adds considerable safety from ladders sliding back and forth along the gutter. I use it for when I have to clean the gutters and the chimney. You need a long pole to lay it on the edge of the gutter; I use the fiberglass rod from my chimney sweep brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing little tool
customer_reviews.text: What a great little gadget. I put it on my gutter and my ladder was able to lean against it without damaging. Great investment (NOT MUCH $$) Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy's mom

customer_reviews.title: No more scratches on gutters. Stays in place. Easy to use. A must have.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have. No more scratches on gutters. Stays in place due to rubber lining in contact with gutter. Easy to put up, move and take down. Wish I'd thought of it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says but costly
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says perfectly, I can now safely lean the ladder on the gutters without damaging them and risk sliding. The only negative is the price, it is expensive for what it is but I couldnt find a similar cheaper item either.
customer_reviews.author: Bertan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product! It saves the gutter from scratches and stabilizes the ladder when in use. The only thing you have to be careful of are the brackets holding the gutter to the house. The Ladder's little helper has to be placed in between the brackets in order for it to fit in the gutter. . .
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Allen

customer_reviews.title: Makes A World Of Difference
customer_reviews.text: The black rubber shown on picture, and the same rubber on the underside completely stops ladder slide. Im always cautious but worry far less about slide or kick out. Hope this helps in your decision. If so please give it a thumbs up. 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Holder for ladders that slip around on gutters.
customer_reviews.text: It has anti-slip rubber on the inside that contacts the gutter and seems to work well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Haines

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a painting contractor. I found this on Amazon for him to try and he says he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will let you gutters get bent !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my gutters from damage and it is not going to protect them. They will however protect the tiny gutters you can buy from Home Depot. no commercial gutters once your weight is on the ladder going up the gutter will bend.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Smith

customer_reviews.title: Safety First
customer_reviews.text: Great little ladder helper. Secures the ladder very nicely and keeps it from sliding sideways on you when you're stepping off onto the roof.
customer_reviews.author: Malder

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in a timely fashion and works great. Note this doesn't come with a pole to ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely fashion and works great. Note this doesn't come with a pole to place it over your gutter, you must buy that separately. Other note, the Amazon shipping box for this item was comically large.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: It helps to avoid gutter damage, but is not a cure for it.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t support the ladder anymore. There is still a lot of pressure that is applied to the gutter still. No creases though. It helps but is not a cure for avoiding gutter damage caused by a ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien the roofer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't slide along gutter because of cross pieces, so it is hard to position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Worked much better than I thought it might. Very stable with no slipping or damage to the gutter.
customer_reviews.author: chris harrison

customer_reviews.title: Good, but there are better options
customer_reviews.text: Protects gutter from scratches but does NOT transfer load to tail-end or fascia
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: Gutter saver
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was buying one to fit in the gutter to keep it from crushing it but it does not it just goes over the front side it has no support
customer_reviews.author: Bobby ashlock

customer_reviews.title: A Great Ladder helper
customer_reviews.text: This product is what I needed! Before I purchased the product, I used towels on my ladder to prevent scratches on my gutters. This product prevents this problem and is easy to place on your gutter. It stabilizes your ladder to prevent slippage. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Ooms

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and totally protects gutters from ladder scratches and damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gutter guard
customer_reviews.text: This Simple product does a good job protecting gutters. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little Helper with a big Price
customer_reviews.text: This is an innovative product. It fits my ladders well and is easy to put in place. Would have given it 5 stars, but for the price. It is made of plastic, but sells for $29.99. Should be more like $19.99 on the outside!
customer_reviews.author: Arizonan

customer_reviews.title: A deceptively simple product that is easy to use and saves your gutters from ladders
customer_reviews.text: A deceptively simple product that is easy to use and saves your gutters from ladders. (It beats having a stabilizer on the end of your ladder).
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Besides protecting the gutter, it helps keep the latter ...
customer_reviews.text: Besides protecting the gutter, it helps keep the latter little bit more secure when you're getting on and off the roof. I'll probably buy another one soon
customer_reviews.author: Rich Blanchette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The ladder stays right where I put it.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: cleaning gutters sucks. This keeps the ladder steady and protects the ...
customer_reviews.text: This does the job. Only reason only 4 stars - It's a pain to have one more thing to reposition constantly as you move your way down the line cleaning the gutters. But then, cleaning gutters sucks. This keeps the ladder steady and protects the guttering.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it does not protect the gutter being pinched by the ladder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: don't waste your money. this little helper is too soft, won't help the ladder and gutter. the gutter will flattened when we put the ladder on it.
customer_reviews.author: JX

product_meta.title: Ladder's Little Helper
product_meta.description: Made In USA Anti-slip technology Strong yet lightweight Helps prevent ladder shifting sideways Patented Design Fits 99% of gutters Fits 99% of ladders Protect gutters from scratching
